Text: You combined the whole disc into ONE SINGLE FILE?  Why would you do that?!  If you don't want to take the time to rip the individual episodes then at least rip it as an iso image so it can be mounted and played like a DVD, and then if someone wanted to they could easily rip the individual episodes.  As it is if you want to watch a specific episode you have to load the file containing ALL of them and skip through until you find what you're looking for like it were a goddamn VHS tape.
